(http://curriki.wordpress.com) 1.1 Newsletters * Curriki uses [iContact>http://www.icontact.com] for newsletters; to date Bill, Janet, and Cindee have accounts * the member list is interfaced to the iContact member list using the Admin.iContactUpdater run every day at 3:00 AM PST. The updater displays the last time it was run. * This updater synchronizes many of the fields of the curriki users. In particular the opt-out field is also synchronized (1 being if the user opts out). See the [feature set>https://docs.google.com/a/curriki.org/document/d/1Pzozzf2L6yt7Hs-wL9r5KnlvrXwd7OhbVNMSjJ-E8Tw/edit]. 1.1 Standards ... are obtained from ftp.academicbenchmarks.com with the username curriki.
